rules_text:
When Abyssal Corrupter enters the battlefield, if you cast it, choose one –
• Return to the battlefield target creature card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn.
• Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
notes:
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
